update.description:
* Requires [this](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/280/document-actor-make-skin-and-animation/diff) SDF pull request

* This PR should make [this](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/pull-requests/366/actor/diff) tutorial work

Changes:

* Use same skin and animation in `cafe.world`

* Made the shirt of `moonwalk.dae` red, so it is different from the other actors. This helps explaining the difference between skin and animation in the tutorial.

* Refactored `physics::Actor` so:

    * Scripts can be used without skin / animation (so it works if we have only links)

    * If animation is not specified, try to get animation from skin

* Added tests for actors
update.title: Generalize actors

content.raw: I hadn't noticed this before, it must have started since the update rate was changed. Fixed the test in bbcbd8e
content.html: I hadn't noticed this before, it must have started since the update rate was changed. Fixed the test in bbcbd8e

content.raw:
do you get this test failure?

~~~
[ RUN      ] ActorTest.TrajectoryFromSDF
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.1.93
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:200] ServerFixture load in 1.3 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
/media/ian/tmp/depot/ws6/src/gazebo_ext2/gazebo/physics/Actor_TEST.cc:91: Failure
Value of: 4.0
  Actual: 4
Expected: actor->ScriptTime()
Which is: 3.978
/media/ian/tmp/depot/ws6/src/gazebo_ext2/gazebo/physics/Actor_TEST.cc:98: Failure
Value of: 8.0
  Actual: 8
Expected: actor->ScriptTime()
Which is: 7.99
~~~
content.html:
do you get this test failure?

[ RUN      ] ActorTest.TrajectoryFromSDF
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.1.93
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:200] ServerFixture load in 1.3 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
/media/ian/tmp/depot/ws6/src/gazebo_ext2/gazebo/physics/Actor_TEST.cc:91: Failure
Value of: 4.0
  Actual: 4
Expected: actor->ScriptTime()
Which is: 3.978
/media/ian/tmp/depot/ws6/src/gazebo_ext2/gazebo/physics/Actor_TEST.cc:98: Failure
Value of: 8.0
  Actual: 8
Expected: actor->ScriptTime()
Which is: 7.99

content.raw: Same here, fabs is not needed.
I think `Distance` is guaranteed to be positive, so the `fabs` is not necessary.
content.html: I think Distance is guaranteed to be positive, so the fabs is not necessary.
